attributes.title: My house!!!!
attributes.review: It all began Wednesday night I was just sitting on my bed when I opened this app then I here a boom in my back yard. The Great Wall of China was in my back yard! Then when I went to make chicken wing 🍗chicken wing 🍗hotdog 🌭and bologna 🥏chicken🍗and macaroni 🍚 for dinner and my house was on fire! Jk I’m in a tree house.

attributes.title: Worst app ever.
attributes.review: This app is god awful and should be removed from the App Store! It makes my phone slow, it’s so pointless and the user interface is awful!! Over all the worst app I have ever had on my phone!!

attributes.title: absolutely horrible app my grandma died
attributes.review: My grandma absolutely LOVED donald trump and did everything he suggested including swallowing Clorox cleaning wipes to clean out her system of virus. She then died of intoxication. Any president that can tell someone to purposefully kill there self is obviously not a good president.

attributes.title: Donald Trump App Gave Me Death Threats
attributes.review: As I checking out the app and reading all of the essential information, the app kept giving me death threats as notifications. I was completely scared and uncomfortable with these threats. Donald Trump do better.✨Oh wait you can’t✨

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!
attributes.review: THIS APP TOOK A WEEK TO DOWNLOAD! I was hoping to find reason to vote donald trump. When i went into the app it glitched me out immediately, I said try to get back in the app it continuously glitched me out! and my Wi-Fi was working! please do not consider on downloading this app it is horrible!😡

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: I downloaded it and before I could open it my entire phone froze. I had to hard reset it and lost all of my pictures and data. Complete scam don’t download it.

Downloaded to see how I could support small Cheeto man ✨✨ Then it kept glitching 😭🤧😩 Something about how he’s insanely racist 😵 and continually stands with white supremacists 😤😤😤 And then all the people who support him are brainwashed 🤐 and dumb and just as terrible as he is 🤯🤢🤮—

Oh wait... It’s true 🤷🏻‍♀️💕✨

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I tried to download this app FOREVER and the app keeps crashing every time I click on it and it’s very low quality I saw a video and the video said it collects your data and gives it to the government which is not good

attributes.title: Just awful
attributes.review: The entire app is full of fake news, it’s all a way to make him seem like an ok president, when really he’s a horrible mess. Even republicans should see that he doesn’t stand for anything good.

attributes.title: Propaganda
attributes.review: This app is a tool used by the president to pedal propaganda and false information to his already ignorant platform. I came here to try and see the other side of things and was only met with anger, name calling, and fear mongering. This app has no place on the app store.
